topic.title: Removing the Expansion Schema
topic.shortdesc: To clean up after expanding the Greenplum cluster, remove the expansion schema.

body.p: You can safely remove the expansion schema after the expansion operation is complete and verified. To run another expansion operation on a Greenplum system, first remove the existing expansion schema.

ol.li: Log in on the master host as the user who will be running your Greenplum Database system (for example, gpadmin).
Run the gpexpand utility with the -c option. For example:$ gpexpand -cSome systems require you to press Enter twice.
